actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to transfer to the Attorney General jurisdiction over the District of Columbia penal facilities at Lorton.

summary.text: Transfers to the Attorney General the jurisdiction over the District of Columbia penal facilities at Lorton, Virginia. Transfers to the Attorney General all of the functions, duties and powers related to the care, custody, discipline, instruction, and rehabilitation of persons committed to such penal facilities.

titles.title: A bill to transfer to the Attorney General jurisdiction over the District of Columbia penal facilities at Lorton.
